need_to_sign_in: You need an account to play! Please sign in.
header_discription: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
wait_for_opponent_to_move:
No games are currently available for you to play.
Please wait for an opponent to make a move.
wrong_side_message: You are already playing the other side of this game, so you must wait for an opponenet to play before you can make a move.
invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
username_too_short: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
username_in_use: That username is in use. Please choose a different one.
bad_login:
Username or password not correct.
Please try again, or use the "Forgot Password" button if you need to.
faq_a1:
Distrochess is the brain child of Marc A. Donis, who was just trying to avoid bordom.
Distrochess is actually the reincarnation of an old idea, originally named Discochess back around 2007.
faq_a2: Just make the best move you can! Each time you make a move, you will be presented with a new game.
faq_q3: How is my Elo rating computed?
faq_a3: Your Elo rating is initially set to 1200. When a game in which you have participated is decided, your Elo will change according to the normal rules, except that you will receive a proportion of the allocated points according to your ratio of participation in that game.
